```{r functions, warning = F, echo = F}



#' metricsEST_XLS - calculates the performance of the Excel EST forcast function
#'
#' @param new_data 
#' @param modelName 
#' @param datasetName 
#' @param multi_metric 
#'
#' @return dataframe with the performance measurements
#' @export
#'
#' @examples
metricsEST_XLS <- function(new_data, modelName, datasetName, multi_metric) {
  
  m <- as.data.frame(new_data) %>% dplyr::select(actual,y) %>%  multi_metric(truth=actual, estimate=y)
  m$model <- modelName
  m$dataset <- datasetName
  m$value_round <- round(m$.estimate,3)
  
  return(m)
}



#' plotResults - plot the forcasting results from each of the models and datasets
#'
#' @param train_tb 
#' @param new_data 
#' @param modelName 
#' @param datasetName 
#' @param n 
#' @param perfMetrics 
#'
#' @return NULL
#' @export
#'
#' @examples
plotResults <- function(train_tb, new_data, modelName, datasetName, n, perfMetrics) {

    plt1 <- ggplot() + geom_line(data = train_tb, aes(y=y, x=ds), color="darkgray") +
  		geom_line(data = new_data, aes(y=actual, x=ds), color="darkgray") + 
  		geom_line(data = new_data, aes(y=y, x=ds), color="steelblue", linetype="twodash") 
  
  plt2 <- ggplot() + geom_line(data = new_data, aes(y=actual, x=ds), color="darkgray") + 
  	geom_line(data = new_data, aes(y=y, x=ds), color="steelblue", linetype="twodash") 
  
  plt3 <- ggplot(data=perfMetrics, aes(x=value_round, y=.metric, fill=.metric)) +
    coord_flip() + 
    geom_bar(stat = 'identity', position=position_dodge()) 

  
  titleStr <- paste0('Forecast ',datasetName,'(',modelName,'):', n )
  suppressWarnings(
    print( ((plt1 / plt2) | plt3) + plot_annotation(title =titleStr))
  )
 
}



#' prophetModel - execute the prophet model
#'
#' @param train_tb 
#' @param train_rows 
#' @param test_rows 
#' @param freq 
#'
#' @return the resulting dataframe
#' @export
#'
#' @examples
prophetModel2 <- function(train_tb,train_rows, test_rows, freq) {
  
	p_mdl <- NULL
	p_mdl <- prophet()
	p_mdl <- add_country_holidays(p_mdl, country_name = 'US')
	p_mdl <- fit.prophet(p_mdl, train_tb)

	# predict prophet model
	future <- make_future_dataframe(p_mdl, periods = test_rows, freq = freq)
	forecast <- predict(p_mdl, future)
	tail(forecast[c('ds', 'yhat', 'yhat_lower', 'yhat_upper')])
	#prophet_plot_components(p_mdl, forecast)
	
	
	predict_data <- forecast |> slice((train_rows+1):(train_rows+test_rows)) 
	p_data <- predict_data |> select(yhat)
	v_data <- test_tb |> select(y)
	
	
	data_df <- data.frame(
		y =p_data$yhat,
		actual = v_data$y,
		ds = as.Date(predict_data$ds)
		#ds = predict_data$ds
	)
	
	return(data_df)

}




prophetModel <- function(train_tb,train_rows, test_rows, new_data) {

  # train model
  fit <- train_tb %>% model(arima = ARIMA(y))

  # predict
  fc <- fit %>% forecast(new_data = new_data)
  
  
  data_df <- data.frame(
    y =fc$.mean,
    actual = new_data$y,
    ds = new_data$ds
  )
	
	return(data_df)
  
}
```

# Calculate Performance

```{r, warning = F}


#data_M1 <- subset(M1, "INDUST")
final_results_df <- data.frame(
                        .metric = character(),
                        .estimator = character(),
                        .estimate = double(),
                        model = character(),
                        dataset = character(),
                        value_round = double()
)


# load updated workbook
wb <- loadWorkbook(fileName)

for (d_set in M_M4[indices.m4]) {

  

  freq <- as.character(feqSet[as.character(d_set$period)])
  
  
  train_tb <- as_tsibble(d_set$x)
  names(train_tb) <- c('ds','y')
  train_tb <-  train_tb %>% update_tsibble(index = ds)
  train_rows <- nrow(train_tb)
  
  test_tb <- as_tsibble(d_set$xx)
  names(test_tb) <- c('ds','y')
  test_tb <-  test_tb %>% update_tsibble(index = ds)
  test_rows <- nrow(test_tb)
  
  new_data <- test_tb %>% select(ds,y) #%>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
  new_data <- data.frame(test_tb)
  
  
  
   if (freq == 'quarter') {
     
    train_tb$ds <- yearquarter(train_tb$ds)
    train_tb <-  train_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    test_tb$ds <- yearquarter(test_tb$ds)
    test_tb <-  test_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    #new_data$ds <- yearquarter(new_data$ds)
    new_data <- test_tb %>% select(ds,y) %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    
    
   } else if (freq == 'months') {
    
    train_tb$ds <- yearmonth(train_tb$ds)
    train_tb <-  train_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    test_tb$ds <- yearmonth(test_tb$ds)
    test_tb <-  test_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    #new_data$ds <- yearmonth(new_data$ds)
    new_data <- test_tb %>% select(ds,y) %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    
  } else if (freq == 'week') {
    
    train_tb$ds <- yearweek(train_tb$ds)
    train_tb <-  train_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    test_tb$ds <- yearweek(test_tb$ds)
    test_tb <-  test_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    #new_data$ds <- yearweek(new_data$ds)
    new_data <- test_tb %>% select(ds,y) %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
  
  } else if (freq == 'day') {  
    
    train_tb$ds <- ymd(train_tb$ds)
    train_tb <-  train_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    test_tb$ds <- ymd(test_tb$ds)
    test_tb <-  test_tb %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    #new_data$ds <- ymd(new_data$ds)
    new_data <- test_tb %>% select(ds,y) %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    
  } 
  
  
  if ( d_set$n > 2 ) {
  
    # ets_xls
    sh1 <-readWorkbook(wb, sheet = d_set$st, detectDates=TRUE)
    new_data <- sh1 %>% dplyr::slice((train_rows+1):(train_rows+test_rows))
    new_data$actual <- test_tb$y
    
    if (freq == 'quarter') {
        new_data$ds <- yearquarter(new_data$ds)
    } else if (freq == 'months') {
        new_data$ds <- yearmonth(new_data$ds)
    } else if (freq == 'week') {
        new_data$ds <- yearweek(new_data$ds)
    } else if (freq == 'day') {
        new_data$ds <- ymd(new_data$ds)
    }
    
    new_data <- new_data %>% as_tsibble(index = ds)
    perfMetrics <- metricsEST_XLS(new_data, 'ets_xls', d_set$st, multi_metric)
    final_results_df <- bind_rows(final_results_df, perfMetrics)
    plotResults(train_tb, new_data, 'ets_xls', d_set$st, d_set$n, perfMetrics)
    
    
    # prophet
    #new_data <- prophetModel(train_tb,train_rows, test_rows, freq)
    new_data <- prophetModel(train_tb,train_rows, test_rows, new_data)
    perfMetrics <- metricsEST_XLS(new_data, 'prophet', d_set$st, multi_metric)
    final_results_df <- bind_rows(final_results_df, perfMetrics)
    plotResults(train_tb, new_data, 'Prophet', d_set$st, d_set$n, perfMetrics)  
    
    
  }

}
```
